summary: Comprehensive testing of SEO Article Builder completed. Tested JWT authentication, 8 content templates, Kurdynowski branding, and protected routes. All backend APIs working, frontend authentication flow functional, template system operational.

design_issues.issue: Console warnings about HTML structure - span elements inside tbody

passed_tests: POST /api/auth/register creates user and returns JWT token
POST /api/auth/login authenticates user and returns JWT token
GET /api/auth/me returns user data with valid token
Frontend /auth page shows login/register forms with Kurdynowski branding
Registration creates account and redirects to dashboard
Login authenticates and redirects to dashboard
Sidebar shows user name, email, and logout button after login
Generator page shows 8 template cards in 3 categories
